about_the_game:
An archipelago of islands from which no one has ever returned...

Prepare to plunge into a world of chaos, where scientific experiments have gone wrong and reality has been torn to shreds. Crowds of bloodthirsty zombies, flying gremlins, giant monsters - all this has become commonplace on islands that were once prosperous regions. After a catastrophe that remains a mystery, the cities have fallen and the inhabitants have become a sheer terror.

Your task is simple but deadly: collect spells, buy powerful weapons, and destroy enemies while exploring a variety of locations, from gothic castles to abandoned laboratories. Disable the five defense towers that create a barrier to reach the main island. Then head to the epicenter of the anomaly and destroy it while battling an army of monsters and their giant leaders.

Velhodium Isle offers 5 huge regions, each with its own unique themes and locations. Here you will find:

Medieval castles with knights and animated trees.

Egyptian pyramids with mysterious robots inside.

Snowy wastelands and frozen ports hiding dangerous creatures.

Urban post-apocalyptic zones ravaged in chaos.

Fantasy worlds filled with ghosts, demons and unexpected enemies.

A huge variety of gameplay:

Choose your path to victory. You won't be able to complain about the difficulty - this is a game where you choose your own playthrough style.

Exciting retro shooter atmosphere with modern improvements:

Realistic physics.

Fully immersive lighting.

Detailed locations that take you to a variety of eras and places.

Velhodium Isle is a unique combination of classic retro boomer shooters with elements of modern gameplay design. Grab your weapons, prepare for chaos and prove that you can survive where no one else has.

Will you be able to correct the mistakes of scientists and save the world?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: X64 architecture
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780M
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Velhodium Isle is a pixel-art boomer shooter in which you fight monsters in themed locations. Use weapons and magic to get through crowds of monsters and close the source of apocalyptic terrors. Disable shields, close the anomaly, and survive the brutal slaughter!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Finnish, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Ukrainian
